channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Best Wireless Headphones (2025): Tested Over Many Hours
item.description: Whether you need workout earbuds or gaming over-ears, these WIRED-tested picks sound like a million bucks.

item.title: Nikola’s hydrogen trucks hit the auction block
item.description: Nikola’s hydrogen trucks are officially up for auction, one of the company’s last big steps in unloading all of its assets after filing for bankruptcy...

item.title: The 6 Best Bamboo Sheets for Silky-Soft Sleep (2025)
item.description: Looking for softer sheets? Bamboo sheets are here to help, bringing some of the softest texture you'll find in bed sheets.

item.title: Bluesky takes on ‘Sports Twitter’ with NBA playoff feature
item.description: As the playoffs rage on, Bluesky announced that it is beta testing a new feature during the NBA playoffs. While an NBA game is in progress, a red bord...

item.title: Clock’s ticking: Save up to $900 on TechCrunch Disrupt 2025 tickets before prices rise
item.description: Tick-tock! Time’s almost up to save up to $900 on individual passes to TechCrunch Disrupt 2025! Or go big and grab an Early Bird ticket now and get a ...

item.title: 21 Best MagSafe Accessories (2025), Tested and Reviewed
item.description: The weird, wonderful world of MagSafe accessories can make your smartphone feel modular. These are our favorites.

item.title: Pharma giant Regeneron to buy 23andMe and its customers’ data for $256M
item.description: 23andMe was sold by bankruptcy auction, a year after the company had a massive data breach.

item.title: Who Even Is a Criminal Now?
item.description: WIRED loves a rogue. Except rogues ruined the internet. Is there any salvaging the rebellious spirit without destroying everything?

item.title: 12 Ways to Upgrade Your Wi-Fi and Make Your Internet Faster (2025)
item.description: From changing Wi-Fi channels to routing an Ethernet cable, there’s always something you can do to improve your internet at home.

item.title: Ex-Siri head reportedly wanted Apple to choose Google’s Gemini over ChatGPT
item.description: Former Siri head John Giannandrea pushed Apple to choose Google’s Gemini chatbot over ChatGPT for the first chatbot integration with Siri last year, a...
